name: Aquatic Cave Assault: Rejammed
description:
GameJam sequel to a previous GameJam game. Aquatic Cave Assault: Rejammed puts you in command of a submarine. Tasked with clearing the area of troubles so the WarpGate network can be brought back online. Ballast is important when trying to ascend rapidly. Watch out for those nasty Razor Fish and pirates!

# Credits

Programming : Danial Bulloch

Art : Leadphalanx

Photography: Leadphalanx

AI Imagemancer & fish model: Quack Astra

Concept Art: AngryJim

Godot Documentation Fish Shader : https://docs.godotengine.org/en/stable/tutorials/performance/vertex_animation/an...

# Engine

Godot Engine 3.5 - https://godotengine.org/
